movementAbilities.name: Pounce I
movementAbilities.description: Jump, on landing select 1 target within [MELEE RANGE]: 10 + [MARTIAL LEVEL] + [STR] or fall prone.

movementAbilities.name: Pounce II
movementAbilities.description: Jump, on landing select multiple targets within [MELEE RANGE]: 10 + [MARTIAL LEVEL] + [STR] or fall prone.

reactionAbilities.name: Unnatural Dodge
reactionAbilities.description: When hit by an [ATTACK] halve the damge recieved by that [ATTACK].

otherAbilities.name: Heal I
otherAbilities.description: Heal, [MEELE RANGE] reach, 1 target, [LIGHT SPELL DAMAGE]

otherAbilities.name: Heal II
otherAbilities.description: Heal, [MEELE RANGE] reach, 1 target, [MEDIUM SPELL DAMAGE]

otherAbilities.name: Heal III
otherAbilities.description: Heal, [MEELE RANGE] reach, 1 target, [HEAVY SPELL DAMAGE]
